title: my pixel 3 xl battery start to swell, i bought it in the google store, what can i do?
content:
my pixel 3 xl battery start to swell, i bought the phone in the US google store on March 15, 2019  i understand that send it by mail is not recommended

how should i proceed?

I'm currently out of the country (USA)
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
